name: header | footer
publisher: U.S. Office of the National Coordinator (ONC)'s Standards and Infrastructure (S&I) Structured Data Capture project
description: If specified, indicates that the group should be rendered as a repeating header or footer on each "page" of the questionnaire.

element.formal: If specified, indicates that the group should be rendered as a repeating header or footer on each "page" of the questionnaire.
element.comments: When omitted, sections are presumed to be "regular" sections.

binding.name: QuestionnaireGroupSpecialType
binding.description: If specified, indicates that the group should be rendered as a repeating header or footer on each "page" of the questionnaire.
